00027 #ifndef xtcc_expr_h
00028 #define xtcc_expr_h
00029 #include "tree.h"

00032 // the user of this enum e_operator_type should not depend on the order in which 
00033 // the elements are defined
00034 enum e_operator_type { oper_plus, oper_minus, oper_mult, oper_div, oper_and, oper_or, oper_lt, oper_gt,
00035                 oper_le, oper_ge, oper_isneq, oper_iseq, oper_parexp, oper_umin, oper_num,  oper_name, oper_arrderef,
00036                 oper_arr2deref, oper_func_call, oper_text_expr, oper_float, oper_assgn , oper_not, oper_mod,
00037                 oper_blk_arr_assgn, oper_in, oper_q_expr_in, oper_q_expr_arr_in,
00038                 oper_err
00039         };
00040 
00041 string human_readable_expr_type( e_operator_type e_type);
00042 
00043 struct expr {
00044         e_operator_type e_type;
00045         datatype type;
00046         struct expr * next, *prev;
00047         expr(e_operator_type le_type):e_type(le_type), type(ERROR_TYPE), next(0), prev(0) { }
00048         expr(e_operator_type le_type, datatype ldt):e_type(le_type), type(ldt), next(0), prev(0) 
00049         {}
00050         //virtual void print_expr(FILE * edit_out)=0;
00051         virtual void print_expr(ostringstream& code_bef_expr, ostringstream & code_expr)=0;
00052 
00053         virtual int isvalid();
00054         virtual bool is_lvalue()=0;
00055         virtual bool is_const()=0;
00056         virtual bool is_integral_expr()=0;
00057         virtual ~expr();
00058         private:
00059                 expr& operator=(const expr&);
00060                 expr (const expr&);
00061 };
00062 
00063 extern int no_errors;
00064 extern int line_no;
00065 
00066 struct un_expr : public expr{
00067         protected:
00068         expr* operand;
00069         public:
00070         un_expr( expr * l_operand=0, e_operator_type le_type=oper_err);
00071         bool is_lvalue(){ return false; }
00072         //void print_expr(FILE * edit_out);
00073         virtual void print_expr(ostringstream& code_bef_expr, ostringstream & code_expr);
00074         virtual ~un_expr();
00075         virtual bool is_const();
00076         virtual bool is_integral_expr();
00077         private:
00078                 un_expr& operator=(const un_expr&);
00079                 un_expr (const un_expr&);
00080 };

00103 struct bin2_expr: public expr{

00113         virtual bool is_const();

00118         ~bin2_expr();
00119         private:

00124 struct bin_expr: public expr{
00125         public:
00126         expr *l_op, *r_op;
00127         public:
00128         bin_expr(expr* llop, expr* lrop,e_operator_type letype);
00129         bool is_lvalue(){ return false; }
00130         //void print_oper_assgn(FILE * edit_out);
00131         void print_oper_assgn(ostringstream& code_bef_expr, ostringstream & code_expr);
00132         //void print_expr(FILE * edit_out);
00133         virtual void print_expr(ostringstream& code_bef_expr, ostringstream & code_expr);
00134         virtual bool is_const();
00135         virtual bool is_integral_expr();
00136         ~bin_expr();
00137         private:

00139                 bin_expr (const bin_expr&);
00140 };

00155         //int line_no;

00158         virtual bool is_integral_expr();

00160         un2_expr(e_operator_type le_type, datatype ldt, expr* e_list, int lfunc_index_in_table);
00161         const symtab_ent* get_symp_ptr(){
00162                 return (const symtab_ent*) symp;
00163         }
00164 
00165         un2_expr(int l_isem_value);
00166 
00167         un2_expr(double l_dsem_value);

00173         un2_expr(char* ltxt, e_operator_type le_type);
